Real deal Sichuan - pretty sure the chef was using the Sichuan  dialect while preparing our food.  I've been to Chengdu before and this brings me back. The fact that I can get this in Staten Island of all places says a lot about how our borough continues to grow. Fantastic -love it.

I absolutely LOVE Sichuan cuisine and was looking forward to the day one opened here on SI. This is the real deal. Incredible flavor and presentation, spicy but not excessively so. Just a nice warm heat. The Dan Dan noodles were ğŸ¤¤.

The food is incredible! Iâ€™ve been craving Sichuan food so much and this place hits the spotğŸ‰. Highly recommend the pork belly in chili oil!! The staff were extremely friendly as well. Will be making more trips in the future to try more of their food! â¤ï¸

came here on a whim because my boyfriend and I saw that this place was new, and we were SO pleasantly surprised! it became our favorite place to eat on the island in just one visit. we thought we ordered too much, but ended up finishing every single dish.
Dan dan noodles are one of my favourites and this place had the best I have tried!

This is a very sweet spot to visit. We tried dishes I've never had before. They were very considerate with my sesame allergy, which isn't easy when eating at an Asian restaurant. You can tell all the dishes were made with love and care, helping you understand the culture of the food they prepare. Everything was made fresh and quickly. If you like spicy dishes, youll love what they can make for you! Try this place out!
The staff were so incredibly friendly! The food was so delicious and I canâ€™t wait to go back again already. Generous portions for a great price. Thank you guys so much! â˜ºï¸
The best food and the best service!!
Great experience.Everyone,especially waiter, is extremely kind
Really good food! Tried a little bit if everything, it was worth it ! Coming back for sure !
